title: Understanding Rotation of Axes
text: Rotating the coordinate axes can eliminate the xy term from the equation of the conic section. This technique simplifies the equation by aligning it with the principal axes of the conic.

title: Identifying the Rotation Formula
text: The formula to find the angle θ for eliminating the xy term is θ $$=$$ $$0.5$$ * $$\arctan(\frac{2B}{A-C})$$, given the conic equation in the form Ax²+2Bxy+Cy²+Dx+Ey+F=0.
